QuestData.Title: The Etymidian
QuestData.Description: It is time, $n. The Waygate has been activated for the first time in seven centuries. Use it to travel to where our final hope lies.$B$BLet us put an end to those who would seek to bring the taint of undeath to this pristine land. Let us unleash the Etymidian.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go through the Waygate in the southern end of Sholazar Basin and look for the weapon known as the Etymidian on the other side.
QuestData.RewardText: <As you read the engravings on this stone colossus, you realize that this is the weapon that Freya spoke of. This is the Etymidian.>
